nodes.description: 巴基斯坦西南部Mastung地区选举集会遭遇自杀式爆炸
nodes.support_text: Turkey on Saturday condemned Friday's bombing targeting an election rally in southwest Pakistan.

nodes.description: 爆炸造成至少128人死亡、数百人受伤
nodes.support_text: At least 128 people were killed and hundreds injured when a suspected suicide bomber detonated himself in an election rally...

nodes.description: 土耳其总统发言人谴责袭击并声援巴基斯坦
nodes.support_text: presidential spokesperson Ibrahim Kalın told Anadolu Agency.

nodes.description: 当地医院实施紧急管理并调配医疗资源
nodes.support_text: Hospitals in the area have been placed under 'emergency' management after being overwhelmed...

nodes.description: 巴政府部署额外安保力量并加强敏感区域管控
nodes.support_text: extra security forces had been deployed in 'sensitive areas'

nodes.description: 巴安装临时政府并宣布7月25日选举为哀悼日
nodes.support_text: A caretaker government has been installed ahead of the July 25 election

nodes.description: 安全分析家指出袭击显示恐怖组织协调行动
nodes.support_text: Security analyst Rahimullah Yusufzai termed the blasts a 'wave of terror'

nodes.description: 选举前一周连环袭击已致154人死亡
nodes.support_text: the attack was by far the deadliest of a series of blasts...have killed at least 154 people

nodes.description: 回顾2014年Peshawar学校恐袭事件背景
nodes.support_text: Violence has dropped significantly since the country's deadliest-ever militant attack...

nodes.description: 巴军方加强边境地区反恐行动改善安全
nodes.support_text: military intensified operations against militants in the tribal areas...
